CONTENT: Donald speaking. I am calling about my roaming fees abroad. I got a lump sum roaming package and still you charged me 800 Dollars roaming on top. My generous and well-spirited uncle had a pink fit when he saw the bill. We need to fix this or you will loose a customer. No, not by cancellation, the other way. Oh, I have to stop, my uncle is coming up the driveway. But I have to say, your pricing model is preposterous.
